page.title: 16THE TOURIST INDUSTRY
page.content: {Church Wood Estate is a holiday cabin {site built in picturesque woodland. There are{111 cabins,}and they are in two catagories,51 luxury and 60 stan- dard. The area is used very carefully and this is shown by the approval of certain societies for example the {RSPB.}The large array of{flora and {fauna}probably attracts its share of nature loving tourists. The number of {returning tourists}show that people must really love this beautiful area. {47% of the visitors since 1982 have {returned.}The number of visitors in 1984 was 1587. Visitors come mainly from{Bristol,Birmingham,the Midlands, {London,Kent and East Anglia, Hants, {Somerset & Dorset.}The site is open from mid March to January 15th - 10 months. The cabins are all self-cat- ering.{On the site there is a shop, {a TV lounge,and a launderette.
